WebStoreMessageContent.name: WebStoreMessageContent
WebStoreMessageContent.description: Represents the assocation of a managed content message record in CMS to a web store, along with other attributes that specify the application and intent of the message content.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this message content is active (true) or not (false).

ManagedContentId.description: The ID of the managed content in CMS.

MessageApp.description: The application type that uses the message content.

MessageUsage.description: The usage type of the message content.

Name.description: The autogenerated name of the message content.

WebStoreId.description: The ID of the web store.
